content: the model shown has a sole length of 3 3/4 inches approx for baby size 0-4mos use 1 75mm hook to get a bigger size you can use size 8 or size 10 cotton thread with 1 5mm or 1 75mm crochet hook for the model shown size 8 thread and 1 5mm hook was used for the ties you can use 1/4 satin ribbon or crochet ties with a ball or flower embellishment instruction for ties and embellishment is included in the pattern **on-going promo** - 40% off my patterns - when you buy two or more patterns 40% will automatically be discounted
